comments: KEEP OFF. READ MATHS FROM TEXTBOOK INSTEAD OF SOLVING IT.TURNED MATHS INTO ENGLISH READING AND DOES NOT CARE IF STUDENTS UNDERSTAND IT OR NOT. HER READINGS MAKE S YOU FALL ASLEEP. DON\'T TAKE HER IF OU WANT TO KNOW MATHS.
She was not easy. Her class was too hard for it to be just 0308. I recommend you not take her, unless you want to fail.

This teacher is a drag she reads directly from the book and doesn\'t seem concerned when you have ? about the work she has her picks. The class is very boring & will put you to sleep. Take my advice find a teacher with patients & don\'t mind explaining the work over or giving you a lil xtra time DON\'T TAKE HER..........

This teacher put me to sleep several times in class. She read word for word out of the text book and had little interaction and participation from students. She offered little help to students who did not fully understand the material. It is an easy class, if you can manage to stay awake during it.
do not take this class it would be the greatest mistake of your life...this lady put math to sleep..DO NOT TAKE HER!!!
